title: Ministerial and Parliamentary Offices (Emoluments) (Amendment) Regulations, 2022
content:
11th February, 2022 Statutory Instruments 29
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 15 OF 2022
The Ministerial and Parliamentary Offices (Emoluments) Act
(Laws, Volume 15, Cap. 262)
The Ministerial and Parliamentary Offices (Emoluments)
(Amendment) Regulations, 2022
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 2 of the Ministerial
and Parliamentary Offices (Emoluments) Act, and after consultation
with the Standing Orders Committee of the National Assembly, the
following Regulations are made:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Ministerial and Title and
Parliamentary Offices (Emoluments) (Amendment) Regulations, commencement
2022, and shall be read as one with the Ministerial and Parliamentary S.I No. 62 of
Offices (Emoluments) Regulations, 2009, in these Regulations 2009
referred to as the principal Regulations.
(2) These Regulations are deemed to have come into operation
on 1st January, 2022.
2. The principal Regulations are amended by the revocation Revocation
of the First Schedule and the substitution therefor of the Schedule and
replacement
set out in Appendix I.
of First
Schedule
3. The principal Regulations are amended by the revocation of Revocation
the Second Schedule and the substitution therefor of the Schedule and
replacement
set out in Appendix II.
of Second
Schedule
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K 8.00 each.
